statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Queen City coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.90} per pound with some House coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.60} per pound to create \displaystyle{10} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.44} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
